sourcesContent:
import { TextField } from "@mui/material"
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"
import { addUser, setCurrentUser } from "../redux/Actions"
import { useNavigate } from "react-router"
import { InputWithValidate } from "./inputs/InputWithValidate"
import { useState } from "react"
import { InputIdentity } from "./inputs/InputIdentity"
import { InputPassword } from "./inputs/InputPassword"
import { InputPhone } from "./inputs/InputPhone"
import { phoneClear } from "../Functions/PhoneClean"

export const Register = () => {

    let users = useSelector(x => x.Users)

    let dis = useDispatch()

    let nav = useNavigate()

    const [identityErrorMessege, setIdentityErrorMessege] = useState()

    let creditNumberCondition = [{ func: (value) => !/^\d{16}$/.test(value), messege: "invalid credit number" }]

    let validityRegax = "/^((0[1-9])|(1[0-2]))-\d{2}$"
    let validitiCondition = [{ func: (value) => !validityRegax.test(value), messege: "invalid validiti" }]

    let cvvCondition = [{ func: (value) => !/^\d{3}$/.test(value), messege: "invalid cvv" }]

    const login = (e) => {
        e.preventDefault()

        for (let i = 0; i < e.target.length - 2; i += 2)
            if (document.getElementById(e.target[i].id + "-helper-text"))
                return

        for (let i = 0; i < users.length; i++)
            if (users[i].tz == e.target[0].value)
            {
                setIdentityErrorMessege("identity number exists")
                return
            }

        let user = {
            id: (users.length + 1) * 100,
            name: e.target[2].value,
            tz: e.target[0].value,
            phone: phoneClear(e.target[6].value),
            password: e.target[4].value,
            CreditNumber: e.target[8].value,
            validity: e.target[10].value,
            cvv: e.target[12].value,
            userTypeId: 2
        }

        dis(addUser(user))
        dis(setCurrentUser(user))
        nav("/UserZone")

    }

    return <>
        <form onSubmit={(e) => login(e)}>
            <InputIdentity className="inputTextField" id="tzInput" label="identity" errorMessege={identityErrorMessege}></InputIdentity>
            <TextField className="inputTextField" id="nameInput" label="user name"></TextField>
            <InputPassword className="inputTextField" id="passwordInput" type="password" label="password"></InputPassword>
            <InputPhone className="inputTextField" id="phoneInput" type="tel" label="phone"></InputPhone>
            <InputWithValidate className="inputTextField" id="creditNumberInput" label="credit number" conditions={creditNumberCondition} required={true}></InputWithValidate>
            <InputWithValidate className="inputTextField" id="validityInput" label="validity" conditions={validitiCondition} required={true}></InputWithValidate>
            <InputWithValidate className="inputTextField" id="cvvInput" type="password" label="cvv" conditions={cvvCondition} required={true}></InputWithValidate>
            <TextField className="inputTextField" id="submitInput" type="submit" variant="outlined" value={"register"} />
        </form>
    </>
}
